title: Passion Berry Morning Immunity & Detox (Organic) — Spice & Tea Merchants
description: Providing the world's best herbs, spices, and teas for your kitchen.
cleaned_text: Passion Berry Morning Immunity & Detox (Organic) Passion Berry Morning Immunity & Detox (Organic) from $6.99 Start the day by boosting your immune system and detoxifying your body. This blend combines yerba maté and oolong tea with citrus, spice, and passion berry. It brews up earthy with notes of citrus and exotic fruit. Ingredients: Yerba maté, oolong tea, lemon verbena, orange peel, dandelion leaf, rosehips, ginger, fennel, flavor (passion berry). USDA Organic. Caffeine-free. Brewing Instructions: 1 teaspoon per 8oz water. Steep
